results.title: Beta-adrenoceptor antagonism and the hyperthyroid rat heart.
results.text_hl: We wished to define whether the cardiac changes of @<m>DISEASE_Hyperthyroidism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006980 @@@hyperthyroidism@@@ are attenuated by treatment with the beta-adrenoceptor antagonist @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

results.title: Non-selective and selective beta-1-adrenoceptor blocking agents in the treatment of hyperthyroidism.
results.text_hl: Treatment for one month with @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, a selective beta-1-adrenoceptor blocking agent, was evaluated in 20 @<m>DISEASE_Hyperthyroidism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006980 @@@hyperthyroid@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: Differential effects of 3 beta blockers on lipid peroxidation in hyperthyroid muscle.
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were rendered @<m>DISEASE_Hyperthyroidism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006980 @@@hyperthyroid@@@ by the administration of @CHEMICAL_Thyroxine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013974 @@@thyroxine@@@ and treated simultaneously with either @CHEMICAL_Carteolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002354 @@@carteolol@@@ (a nonselective blocker with partial agonist activity; 30 mg/kg/day), @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (a @GENE_UGT1A1 @GENE_24861 @@@beta 1@@@-selective blocker; 50 mg/kg/day), or @CHEMICAL_arotinolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C024523 @@@arotinolol@@@ (a nonselective blocker with weak alpha-blocking action; 50 mg/kg/day) over a 3 week period.

citations.NLM: Asayama K, Hayashibe H, Dobashi K, Kato K. Differential effects of 3 beta blockers on lipid peroxidation in hyperthyroid muscle. Endocrinol Jpn. 1990 Aug;37(4):471-8. PMID: 1707360

results.title: Beta-adrenoreceptor blocking drugs and thyroid hormones in hyperthyroid subjects.
results.text_hl: Serum thyroid hormone concentrations were measured before and during 10 days' treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (200 mg/day), @CHEMICAL_Acebutolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000070 @@@acebutolol@@@ (400 mg/day), @CHEMICAL_Oxprenolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010096 @@@oxprenolol@@@ (160 mg/day) and @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@ (160 mg/day) in 24 @<m>DISEASE_Hyperthyroidism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006980 @@@hyperthyroid@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Jones MK, Birtwell J, Owens DR, Jones GR, Lewis M. Beta-adrenoreceptor blocking drugs and thyroid hormones in hyperthyroid subjects. Postgrad Med J. 1981 Apr;57(666):207-9. PMID: 6117063

results.title: Contribution of the autonomic nervous system to blood pressure and heart rate variability changes in early experimental hyperthyroidism.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ modified neither the heart period nor blood pressure variability in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Hyperthyroidism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006980 @@@hyperthyroidism@@@ and in these @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ the jet of air did not significantly affect the heart period level.

citations.NLM: Safa-Tisseront V, Ponchon P, Laude D, Elghozi JL. Contribution of the autonomic nervous system to blood pressure and heart rate variability changes in early experimental hyperthyroidism. Eur J Pharmacol. 1998 Jul 10;352(2-3):247-55. PMID: 9716361
